row.name: UC4RB_MAX_RETURN_CODE#
row.xui: <text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_MAX_RETURN_CODEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="\d*" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Expected Return Code" tooltip="Specify Return code which is expected to be a success for the specified command/script execution. If you do not specify the return code, action will not validate whether command has been successfully completed or not. In case there are multiple commands, action will check the return code of last executed command" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Expected Return Code</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_MAX_RETURN_CODEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specify Return code which is expected to be a success for the specified command/script execution. If you do not specify the return code, action will not validate whether command has been successfully completed or not. In case there are multiple commands, action will check the return code of last executed command</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="regex">\d*</entry><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text>

row.name: UC4RB_SSH_COMMAND#
